description:
The Fleurir team has met the members of their greatest rival at Galaxy Dream Confections: Kashuu Academy. Both teams advance to the finals, where the theme is "what you wish to convey to the future." Mitsuki says he wants Sayuri to decide what they`ll make in the finals, but he still looks uneasy. What is Mitsuki`s true intent? And what confection will Sayuri come up with?!
Source: crunchyroll
